short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clears Google doodles from new tabs for a minimalist browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your Chrome browsing experience with “Doodle Blocker: Clear New Tab”, the ultimate extension for those who crave a minimalist and distraction-free new tab page. Say goodbye to the colorful and often distracting Google doodles and hello to a clean, serene browsing environment.

Key Features:

Doodle Removal: Automatically removes Google doodles from your new tab page, ensuring a clean and focused interface.

Enhanced Productivity: By eliminating distractions, Doodle Blocker helps you stay focused on your tasks, boosting your productivity.

Simple and Lightweight: A user-friendly interface with minimal impact on your browser’s performance.

Customizable: Though designed to clear doodles, future updates will offer customization options for your new tab page.

Free to Use: Enjoy a streamlined browsing experience at no extra cost.
Perfect for:

Professionals seeking a distraction-free browser interface.
Students who want to maintain focus while researching or studying online.
Anyone who prefers a minimalist approach to their digital environment.
How It Works: Install Doodle Blocker and witness your new tab transform into a clean slate, free from the daily Google doodle. It’s that simple – no configurations, no hassle.

Privacy Focused: We believe in your right to privacy. Doodle Blocker operates without collecting any personal data, ensuring your browsing habits remain private.

Support and Feedback: Your feedback is invaluable to us. We’re continually striving to improve Doodle Blocker and welcome any comments or suggestions. Feel free to reach out through our support page.

Embrace the simplicity of your new tab page with Doodle Blocker: Clear New Tab. Install now and experience a more focused and clutter-free browsing journey.
